resources.string: Udinga ukusebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza kanye ukuze ukwazi ukufinyelela ikhamera ngemuva

Ku-Android 11+, ngaphambi kokuqala ukurekhoda ngemuva, uhlelo lokusebenza kufanele lusebenze futhi lubonakale okungenani kanye ukuze lukwazi ukusebenzisa ikhamera engemuva. Ngakho-ke, ngemva kokuqalisa kabusha idivayisi, yenza uhlelo lokusebenza lubonakale futhi ngemva kwalokho ungavali isevisi yokuqopha, kufanele ihlale esikhungweni sezaziso.
I-Ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo kumile ngoba ikhamera isetshenziswa olunye uhlelo lokusebenza
I-Ukurekhodwa kwevidiyo kumile ngoba ikhamera yedivayisi iyekile ukusebenza

Ikhamera ibisetshenziswa olunye uhlelo lokusebenza. Sicela ungasebenzisi ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza okungenzeka zisebenzisa ikhamera ngenkathi uqopha ividiyo. I-Android ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza olulodwa kuphela ukusebenzisa ikhamera ngesikhathi

Yehlulekile ukuvula ikhamera ekhethiwe. Kwenzeka ukuthi akuwona wonke amakhamera afihliwe angasetshenziswa yinoma yiluphi uhlelo lokusebenza. Abakhiqizi abaningi bavumela kuphela ukusetshenziswa kwabo ezinhlelweni zabo zomdabu. Ikhamera ezenzakalelayo izovuleka.
Ikhamera okwamanje (beyikade) ayitholakali ukuze ivuleke kudivayisi yakho (iphutha lesistimu yekhamera)
Le divayisi ayinayo ikhamera eyakhelwe ngaphakathi futhi ayisekeli amakhamera angaphandle. Iyavala…
Ukuze ususe izikhangiso, umnikelo kufanele ube noma ngaphezulu.
Ngeminikelo emincane, ukukhangisa kususwa esikrinini esikhulu kuphela
Ulwazi lokuthenga alukalayishwa okwamanje. Ingabe uku-inthanethi futhi ungene ngemvume ku-akhawunti yakho ye-Google?
Uma usuvele wenze umnikelo, bese ubuyisela ukuthenga kwakho, sicela ufake kabusha uhlelo lokusebenza ku-Google Play ngemva kokukhetha i-akhawunti ye-Google efanele.
Uma usuwenze umnikelo, bese ubuyisela okuthengiwe, sicela uphinde ufake uhlelo ku-Samsung Galaxy Store ngemuva kokukhetha i-akhawunti efanele.
Susa izikhangiso unaphakade ngomnikelo wesikhathi esisodwa wanoma yiliphi inani.
Ungakwazi futhi ukunikela nyanga zonke ukuze ususe izikhangiso.
Ukukhangisa kususwa ngokuphelele kuyilapho ukubhalisa kwanoma yiliphi inani ngenyanga kusebenza.
Uhlelo lokusebenza alunikezi isikhathi sesilingo sokubhaliselwe, njengoba yonke imisebenzi yohlelo isivele imahhala, ukubhalisa kususa kuphela ukukhangisa.
Ukukhangisa kususwa ngokuphelele ngenkathi ukubhalisa kusebenza.
Ukubhalisa kungakhanselwa nganoma yisiphi isikhathi (inkinobho \"khansela ukubhalisa\" izotholakala, futhi ungakukhansela kuhlelo lokusebenza lwe-Google Play)
Uhlelo lokusebenza alukhishiwe ekulungiselelweni kwebhethri. Uma ikhamera ingasebenzi ngemuva noma enye into, ngeza lolu hlelo lokusebenza ngaphandle kwemodi yokonga amandla.
Uma uphinde wafaka uhlelo ku-Android 11, amafayela amadala kufanele asuswe ngesandla
Umise isevisi yasemuva ukuze uqale ngokuzenzakalelayo ukuqopha ividiyo. Vula uhlelo lokusebenza ukuze uluqalise futhi.
Ukuthuthukisa ibhethri -> Zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza -> Thola uhlelo lokusebenza -> Ungalungisi/ungalondolozi
Lena inguqulo ye-beta yohlelo lokusebenza, ngakho-ke ezinye izinto zingase zingasebenzi noma zingazinzi.
Faka inguqulo ezinzile esitolo sokudlala ukuze ugweme amaphutha.
I-Ikhamera iyeke ukusebenza kungalindelekile, iqala kabusha…
Vala izintandokazi zohlelo lokusebenza ngaphambi kokuqala ukurekhoda
Yehlulekile ukuvula imakrofoni, ukurekhoda kuzoqhubeka ngaphandle komsindo
Ayikwazanga ukuvula lezi zilungiselelo kulolu hlelo lokusebenza, sicela uzame ukuzithola usebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza oluzenzakalelayo lwezilungiselelo zedivayisi
Inzwa ye-G ithole ukushaqeka, ividiyo izovinjwa ukuthi ibhalwe phezu
Khubaza ukulungiselelwa kwebhethri kwalolu hlelo lokusebenza kuzilungiselelo zedivayisi yakho ukuze ugweme amaphutha ekhamera azayo
Kwenzeke iphutha ngenkathi ufinyelela ikhamera. Ukuthuthukisa ibhethri kunikwe amandla
Sicela ufake uhlelo lokusebenza lwewebhu ukuze uvule isixhumanisi
Ayikho inethiwekhi yokuthola ikheli, noma zama ukuqalisa kabusha idivayisi
Yehlulekile ukususa ifayela levidiyo. Kungenzeka ukuthi ulufake kabusha uhlelo lokusebenza futhi imvume yefayela yalahleka, sicela uzame ukulikhipha mathupha
Khulula isikhala ukuze uqhubeke uqopha ividiyo

Isikrini esikhulu sohlelo lokusebenza asikwazanga ukuqaliswa ngoba SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW (bonisa phezu kwawo wonke amanye amawindi ohlelo lokusebenza) imvume ayizange inikezwe noma isikrini sedivayisi sicinyiwe.
Uhlelo lokusebenza olushiwo alukwazanga ukuqaliswa ukuze luvuleke ngokuzenzakalelayo ngoba imvume \"yokubonisa phezu kwazo zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza\" ayizange inikezwe.
Uhlelo lokusebenza alukwazanga ukuvulwa ngoba isikrini besivaliwe (sikhiyiwe).
Uhlelo lokusebenza alukwazanga ukuvulwa ukuze luqale ukurekhoda ngoba isikrini besivaliwe (sikhiyiwe). Qalisa isevisi yokurekhoda yangemuva (AutoStart) ukuze ulungise lokhu.
Uhlelo lokusebenza alukwazanga ukuvulwa ukuze luqale ukurekhoda ngoba imvume \"yokubonisa phezu kwazo zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza\" ayizange inikezwe. Chofoza ukuze unikeze
Vala ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza usebenzisa ikhamera bese uqala kabusha lolu hlelo lokusebenza

Susa amavidiyo amadala, fometha ikhadi lakho le-SD, noma uzame elinye. Futhi, khawulela indawo enkulu yokuqopha ividiyo (okuncane kungcono). Inani elikhulu lamavidiyo alondoloziwe lingabangela izinkinga ezinjalo. Bona futhi i-FAQ mayelana namakhadi e-SD kokuthi Izilungiselelo /Imibuzo Evame Ukubuzwa. Ungazama nokubhalela imemori yefoni esikhundleni sekhadi langaphandle
Misa ukurekhoda. Ayikho inkumbulo eyanele ukuqhubeka
Sicela ulinde isekhondi ngaphambi kokumisa ukurekhoda ngokushesha ngemva kokuqala
Ukuze ushintshe ikhamera, kufanele umise ukurekhoda kwamanje
Usayizi wawo wonke amavidiyo asuka kusayizi ovunyelwe
Awekho amandla ebhethri anele kudivayisi. Khokha noma uqale ukurekhoda uma inkokhiso ingaphezulu kuka-1%%
Iphekhi yolimi ye-TTS (Android Text-to-Speech) ayifakiwe. Vula i-inthanethi ukuze uqale ukulanda
Isevisi yokurekhoda yehlulekile ukuqala. Thepha ukuze ukhubaze ukulungiselelwa kwebhethri kulolu hlelo lokusebenza
Umsindo uyadingeka ukuze urekhode ithrekhi yomsindo lapho uqopha ividiyo
Ikhamera iyadingeka ukuze kuqoshwe ividiyo kanye nokuhlola kuqala kwekhamera.
Lolu hlelo lokusebenza ludinga imvume yokusebenzisa ikhamera ukurekhoda ividiyo. Kodwa wenqaba. Iyavala… Zama ukunikeza imvume kukhamera kuzilungiselelo zesistimu zalolu hlelo lokusebenza
Indawo iyadingeka ukuze udwebe izixhumanisi, ikheli kanye nesivinini kuvidiyo erekhodiwe, noma ubonise le datha esikrinini esikhulu (kuye ngezilungiselelo zakho).
Izaziso ziyadingeka ukuze ukwazi ukubonisa isevisi yokurekhoda engemuva nesimo sokurekhoda kuphaneli yezaziso.
Isitoreji siyadingeka ukuze ulondoloze ividiyo kufolda eyabelwe kanye nemodi yokuqopha loop
Kufanele unikeze Amadivayisi Aseduze (i-Bluetooth) imvume yokurekhoda umcimbi okuzenzakalelayo. Lokhu kungenziwa kuzilungiselelo zesistimu yohlelo lokusebenza.
Sicela uzame ukukhetha indlela ehlukile (isitoreji sasendaweni sedivayisi)

Sebenzisa kuphela ngama-headphone e-Bluetooth. Uma uxhuma kuyunithi yekhanda (umsakazo wemoto) nge-Bluetooth, ngenxa yesizathu esithile lokhu kungase kuqalise ngokuzenzakalelayo ucingo oluya enombolweni evamile kule divayisi.

Uma inikwe amandla, ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza ngeke zikwazi ukusebenzisa imakrofoni. Uma lukhutshaziwe, lolu hlelo lokusebenza lungase lungakwazi ukurekhoda umsindo uma izinhlelo zokusebenza eziningi zisebenzisa imakrofoni (i-Android ayivumeli ngaso sonke isikhathi ukusetshenziswa kanyekanye kombhobho)
Beka kuqala umsindo kulolu hlelo lokusebenza
Ukurekhodwa komsindo okuvela ku-CAMCORDER kungase kungasebenzi kwamanye amadivayisi, kulokhu zama ukushintshela ku-MIC
Qala kabusha ngokuzenzakalelayo uma inqubo yohlelo lokusebenza ibulawa ngokugcwele ngesikhathi sokurekhoda
Kungase kuthathe amaminithi angu-15 ukuqalisa kabusha ukurekhoda ngemva kokuthi inqubo yohlelo lokusebenza isibulawe ngokugcwele. Khubaza le nketho uma kwenzeka ukuziphatha okungalindelekile.

Uma ukurekhoda kuma kungalindelekile (ngenxa yokwehluleka kwekhamera, izinkinga zesistimu, njll.), uhlelo lokusebenza lungazama ukukuqala kabusha ngokuzenzakalelayo. Khubaza le nketho uma kwenzeka ukuziphatha okungalindelekile.

Lokhu kuqinisekisa ukuthi i-CPU (iphrosesa) ihlala isebenza ukuze yamukele i-Bluetooth, ukushaja, noma imicimbi ye-AUX. Gcina le nketho ivaliwe ukuze wonge amandla ebhethri uma ukurekhoda kungasebenzi. Empeleni, iphrosesa kusafanele ivukele imicimbi, kodwa uma uhlelo lokusebenza lungaphenduli emicimbini, zama ukunika amandla le nketho.
Gcina i-CPU ivuliwe (\"Wake Lock\") ukuze uthole isevisi yangemuva ethi \"Watcher\" (isebenzisa amandla ebhethri engeziwe).
Qala ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo ngokuzenzakalelayo uma uhlelo luqala

Iqala ukurekhoda ngokuzenzakalelayo lapho idivayisi ye-bluetooth ixhunyiwe. Ukuze isevisi yokulandela i-bluetooth iqale ngemva kokuba idivayisi isiqaliswe kabusha, kuyadingeka ukuthi idivayisi (isikrini) ivulwe uma kukhona iphasiwedi.

Iqala ukurekhoda ngokuzenzakalelayo lapho uhlelo luqala, idivayisi (isikrini) kufanele ivulwe uma kukhona iphasiwedi. Ngemva kokulayisha, kungathatha imizuzu embalwa ngaphambi kokuthi isistimu yazise uhlelo lokusebenza ukuthi iyaqalisa.
Iqala ukurekhoda ngokuzenzakalelayo lapho ishaja. Ukuze isevisi yokulandelela ukushaja iqale ngemva kokuba idivayisi isiqaliswe kabusha, idivayisi (isikrini) kufanele ivulwe uma kunephasiwedi.
Iqala ukurekhoda ngokuzenzakalelayo lapho ixhunywe kujekhi yomsindo (AUX)

Ukuthuthukisa ibhethri kungavimbela uhlelo lokusebenza ukuthi lusebenze kahle (isibonelo, ukusebenzisa ikhamera noma ukubuyekeza indawo kuyilapho uqopha ividiyo ngemuva). Chofoza lapha ukuze uyikhubaze kulolu hlelo lokusebenza manje
Ukuthuthukisa ibhethri kungase kuvimbele uhlelo lokusebenza ekusebenzeni kahle (isibonelo, ukusebenzisa ikhamera nemakrofoni). Chofoza lapha ukuze uyikhubaze kulolu hlelo lokusebenza manje
Isiginali ekuqaleni kokuqoshwa kwefayela levidiyo elilandelayo
Umkhiqizi wedivayisi angase anganikezi ukufinyelela kuwo wonke amakhamera, ngakho amanye angase angavuli
Umkhiqizi wedivayisi angase anganikezi ngekhamera yelensi ebanzi kuzo zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza
Umkhiqizi wedivayisi angeke anikeze ngama-FPS angama-60 kuzo zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza
Bonisa isexwayiso uma i-GPS ne-Google geolocation kukhutshaziwe
Bonisa isexwayiso kuphela uma i-GPS ivaliwe

Kukhona izilungiselelo kudivayisi yakho ukuvumela izinhlelo zokusebenza ukuthi zidlale ngokuzenzakalela futhi zisebenze ngemuva. Chofoza lapha bese wengeza uhlelo lokusebenza kokuhlukile (vumela i-autostart nokunye) ukuyivumela ukuthi isebenze ngemuva nalapho isikrini sicinyiwe, uma kunqatshelwe.
Vula uhlelo lokusebenza uma ukurekhoda kuqala ngokuzenzakalelayo
Yethula uhlelo lokusebenza uma ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo kuqala
Nge-Android 11 nangaphezulu, ungase ungakwazi ukukhetha noma yiziphi izinhlelo zokusebenza ezifakiwe njengoba isistimu ngokwayo ikhawulela ukubonakala kohlelo lokusebenza (inqubomgomo yobumfihlo)
Buyekeza indawo usebenzisa i-GPS kuphela (ungasebenzisi inethiwekhi)
Uma amanani esivinini emabi, bese uzama indlela endala. Uma amanani enguziro noma engavamile ukubuyekezwa, zama indlela entsha
Ibhalansi phakathi kokunemba kwendawo (izixhumanisi), isivinini kanye nokusetshenziswa kwamandla ebhethri.
Indawo enembe kakhulu (izixhumanisi) nesivinini ngenxa yokusetshenziswa kwamandla ebhethri okukhulu.
Ukunemba okuphansi kwendawo (izixhumanisi) nesivinini ngenxa yokusetshenziswa kwamandla okuphansi kwebhethri.
Ukonga Amandla kufanele kuvaliwe ukuze ukwazi ukuthola izibuyekezo zendawo (GPS) ngemuva.
Susa ngokuzenzakalelayo amavidiyo amadala ngenkathi uqopha uma singekho isikhala esanele samavidiyo amasha

Ukuze wenze isipele okurekhodiwe kwakho, faka izinhlelo zokusebenza ezifana nokuthi Izithombe ze-Google. Thola amafolda okurekhoda kulezi zinhlelo zokusebenza futhi uvule inketho yokusekelayo kuzo (chofoza umbhalo ukuze ubone isibonelo).
Khetha indlela kunoma iyiphi indawo yakho yokugcina (isitoreji sangaphakathi noma ikhadi le-microSD)
Gcina isikrini sivuliwe kuphela uma urekhoda
Vula ukuze usebenzise amamayela esikhundleni samakhilomitha
Indlela yokurekhoda ayisethiwe, chofoza lapha ukuze uyisethe
Ukurekhoda ngeke kubonakale kwezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza, futhi ungasetha i-PIN khodi ukuze ukhiye ukufinyelela

Isexwayiso: okurekhodiwe kusitoreji sangasese kuzosuswa uma uhlelo lokusebenza lukhishiwe.\nUkwenza ikhophi yasenqolobaneni ngezinhlelo zokusebenza zangaphandle (njengezithombe ze-Google) akunakwenzeka kulesi simo, njengoba ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza azikwazi ukufinyelela isitoreji esiyimfihlo salolu hlelo lokusebenza.
Indawo yesitoreji (ifolda), ubude bevidiyo, ukurekhodwa kweluphu, usayizi wefayela omkhulu, inzwa ye-G, ukukhiya ikhodi ye-PIN, qala kabusha ngokuzenzakalelayo lapho kwehluleke
Indawo yokubeka (ifolda), ubude bevidiyo, ukuqoshwa kweluphu, usayizi wefayela omkhulu, ukukhiya ikhodi ye-PIN, qala kabusha ngokuzenzakalelayo lapho ukwehluleka
Linganisela uhlelo lokusebenza ku-Google Play Isitolo
Vimba ividiyo ekususeni ngokuzenzakalelayo (bhala phezu kwayo) uma kutholwa ukushaya
Ngemicimbi ye-Bluetooth kungenzeka kuphela uma inketho \"yokurekhoda kuphela lapho ushaja\" ivaliwe.

Ungaqalisi isevisi yohlelo lokusebenza lwe-AutoStart ukuze wonge ibhethri ngesikhathi ulindele imicimbi ukuthi iqale ukurekhoda ngokuzenzakalelayo. Ku-Android 8 nangaphezulu, lokhu kungenzeka uma kuphela imicimbi ye-Bluetooth enikwe amandla futhi yonke eminye imicimbi ikhutshaziwe.

* Ungavala le nketho ukuze wenze uhlelo lokusebenza luqophe ngokuzenzakalelayo kuphela uma isevisi yangemuva yohlelo lokusebenza (i-AutoStart) isebenza.
- Ukurekhoda okuzenzakalelayo kwemicimbi efana nokushaja, i-Bluetooth noma i-AUX kungenziwa ngaphandle kwezinkinga kuze kufike ku-Android 7.1.
- Kusukela ku-Android 8+, ukurekhoda okuzenzakalelayo ngaphandle kwensiza yohlelo lokusebenza yangemuva (i-AutoStart) kungenziwa kuphela kumicimbi ye-Bluetooth, futhi kwezinye izimo (uma ushaja noma i-AUX) udinga ukuqala isevisi yohlelo lwangemuva (AutoStart) - ngokwethula isicelo uqobo kanye.
- Ukuqala nge-Android 11+, ngaphandle kwensizakalo yohlelo lokusebenza yangemuva (i-AutoStart), ukufinyelela ikhamera ngaphandle kokusebenzisana nomsebenzisi ukuze uqale ukurekhoda kungenzeka kuphela uma imvume "phezu kwazo zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza" inikiwe.
Ukurekhoda okuzenzakalelayo noma ngabe isevisi yangemuva ingasebenzi (AutoStart)
Qala ukurekhoda uma ijubane lilingana /liphakeme (kusekelwe ku-GPS)
Misa ukurekhoda uma ijubane liphansi (kusekelwe ku-GPS)
Umthamo omkhulu wememori wawo wonke amavidiyo (ukurekhoda kweluphu)
Ekuqaleni kohlelo lokusebenza, ekushajeni/ukuvala, ekuxhumeni idivayisi ye-Bluetooth, i-AUX, ekuqaliseni idivayisi
Ukunemba kwesivinini se-GPS, indlela yomhlinzeki wendawo, buyekeza imvamisa
Ukucindezela isikrini ngokushesha /isikhathi eside, ukuvala isikrini, ikheli nokuboniswa kwesivinini, iwindi le-popup, izinkinobho nokuningi

Isinqamuleli sokuqala ukurekhoda, cindezela ngokushesha nangesikhathi eside esikrinini, iwindi le-pop-up, ukudlidliza lapho urekhodwa, isaziso somsindo, ukudlidliza, izinkinobho zesikrini, ukuvala isikrini nokunye.
Ishintsha ngokuzenzakalela izindlela zekhamera zemini /zasebusuku ngezikhathi ezithile
I-bitrate ephezulu - ikhwalithi engcono, kodwa usayizi wefayela wevidiyo omkhulu

I-FPS eyengeziwe - ividiyo ebushelelezi, kodwa ibhethri liphela ngokushesha. Kungcono ukusetha inani lokuqala libe eliphansi kakhulu (eyesibili lingase libe phezulu) ukuze kuqoshwe kangcono ebumnyameni
Amanye amadivaysi angakhawulela usayizi wefayela omkhulu ku-4 GB, ngakho-ke udinga ukukhetha izilungiselelo (i-bitrate, ubude besikhathi, ukulungiswa) ukuze ifayela elilodwa levidiyo lingeqi ku-4 GB.
Thumela lolu hlelo lokusebenza kubangani bakho
Ukuqala/ukumisa ukurekhoda ngaphandle kokuvula isikrini esikhulu
Ibonisa iwindi elinezinkinobho zokulawula phezu kwazo zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza
Bonisa iwindi elintantayo kuphela uma ukurekhoda kusebenza (futhi vala ngokuzenzakalelayo lapho kuma)

Uma isitoreji sakho noma idivayisi ingasekeli amafayela amakhulu kuno-4 GB, vumela le nketho ukuthi iqale ngokuzenzakalelayo ukuqopha ifayela elisha lapho elamanje lifinyelela ku-4 GB. Le nkinga ingenzeka ngamadrayivu e-USB flash kusetshenziswa uhlelo lwefayela le-FAT32 noma ezinguqulweni ezindala ze-Android.
Ayisekelwe ikhamera yamanje. Abakhiqizi bavame ukukhawulela ukusetshenziswa kwayo - itholakala kuphela kuhlelo lokusebenza olujwayelekile lwekhamera
Khombisa umlayezo uma uqala noma umisa ukurekhoda ngesikhathi sokurekhoda
Umsindo ekuqaleni, ima noma iphutha lokurekhoda
Эти опции могут существенно потреблять батарею futhi нагревать устройство. Для видеозаписей главное информация о времени, поэтому все GPS опции вполне можно отключить, включая настройки интерфейса
I-GPX - i-schema ye-XML eklanywe njengefomethi evamile yedatha ye-GPS yezinhlelo zokusebenza zesofthiwe. Ingasetshenziselwa ukuchaza ama-waypoints, amathrekhi nemizila
Imbondela yamagama-ncazo wevidiyo: Idethi (isikhathi), ikheli lendawo, izixhumanisi nesivinini
Imbondela yamagama-ncazo kumavidiyo: idethi (isitembu sesikhathi), umbhalo wangokwezifiso
Uma izibuyekezo zivame kakhulu, ibhethri izophela ngokushesha
Bika iphutha, ukuphahlazeka noma wenze umnikelo
Lokhu kuyadingeka futhi ukuze kugcinwe ukuzinza kokuqoshwa okuqhubekayo ngemuva.
Vumela lolu hlelo lokusebenza ukuthi luvele phezu kwazo zonke ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza. Lokhu kuyadingeka ukuze uqale/umise ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo ngokuzenzakalelayo noma ukuveza iwindi elintantayo
Vumela lolu hlelo lokusebenza ukuthi luvele phezu kwazo zonke ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza. Lokhu kuyadingeka ukuze ubonise iwindi elintantayo
Buyela esikrinini sasekhaya (okurekhodiwe) ukuze usebenzise lesi silungiselelo bese uqala isevisi yokulandelela
Siza ukuthuthukisa noma ukulungisa ukuhumushwa kombhalo ngolimi lwakho
Shintsha isithonjana negama lohlelo lokusebenza ohlelweni
Ngemuva koshintsho, uhlelo lokusebenza lungavala, isithonjana esidala sizokhishwa esikrinini esikhulu socingo (noma ohlwini lwazo zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza), bese kuvela esisha.
Bonisa ukuhlola kuqala kwekhamera esikrinini esikhulu sohlelo lokusebenza
Ukudlidliza lapho uqala noma umisa ukurekhoda
Le khamera ifihliwe ngumkhiqizi futhi kungenzeka ingasebenzi

I-H.265 HEVC ne-AV1 codec inikeza ikhwalithi engcono kuma-bitrate aphansi kune-H.264 AVC, ukuze ukwazi ukonga isikhala ngokunciphisa i-bitrate. Kodwa amavidiyo angase angadlali kwezinye izidlali zevidiyo
Khubaza uma ufuna ukulawula mathupha ubude bozimele benzwa, isikhathi sokuchayeka, ukuzwela, nokuvuleka
Isibuko esivundlile sevidiyo. Isithombe sishintsha kuphela ekurekhodweni kwevidiyo, ukubuka kuqala akushintshi
Ukulungiswa, isilinganiso sebhithi, umumo, ukugxila, ikhamera, imodi yasebusuku
Isikhathi seqile. Uhlaka olulodwa njalo ngemizuzwana engu-N
Irekhoda uhlaka lwekhamera olulodwa njalo ngamasekhondi angu-N ashiwo. Imodi yokudlula isikhathi ingaphuthelwa ubufakazi obubalulekile! Amavidiyo adlula isikhathi awanawo umsindo.
Lokhu kuyadingeka ukuze uthole isivinini esisekelwe ku-GPS esinembe kakhulu, kanye nekheli nezixhumanisi. Chofoza ukuze uthumele
Kuyadingeka ukuze ukwazi ukubonisa isevisi yokurekhoda engemuva kanye nezimo kuphaneli yezaziso. Chofoza ukuze uthumele
Ukurekhoda okuzenzakalelayo ngoxhumo lwe-Bluetooth kudinga imvume. Chofoza lapha ukuze uthumele
Ukuze ufinyelele ikhamera ye-ultra-engeli ebanzi (ilens), ungasetha isici sokusondeza
Okwamanje, ukurekhodwa komsindo akunakwenzeka ngoba imakrofoni ibanjwe olunye uhlelo lokusebenza
Uhlelo lokusebenza lusebenzisa i-Firebase Analytics ukuthola izibalo eziyisisekelo ezingaziwa (bona isixhumanisi ngezansi)

Uhlelo lokusebenza lusebenzisa izikhangiso ze-Huawei Petal (ukukhombisa izikhangiso) nokuthenga kohlelo lokusebenza (ukususa izikhangiso). Sicela uchofoze isixhumanisi senqubomgomo yobumfihlo ukuthola eminye imininingwane.

Uhlelo lokusebenza lusebenzisa izimvume ezilandelayo:
- Vula inkomba yedivayisi engaziwa i-OAID (yokukhangisa komuntu siqu)
- IKHAMERA, I-AUDIO (yokurekhoda ividiyo)
- ISITOREJI (sokugcina amavidiyo)
- INDAWO (ukuthola ikheli lendawo yamanje, izixhumanisi ze-GPS, isivinini - ukukhombisa esikrinini esikhulu sohlelo lokusebenza nokusebenzisa imibhalo engezansi kuvidiyo)
- Ukukhangisa kwe-inthanethi)

Ubumfihlo: Wonke amavidiyo owarekhodayo azolondolozwa kuphela kudivayisi yakho yasendaweni. Uhlelo lokusebenza aluwagcini amavidiyo akho (alunakho ukuxhumana neziphakeli)\n\nUhlelo lokusebenza luzoqhubeka lusebenza ngemuva (isevisi yangaphambili evela kubha yezaziso) ngenkathi ukurekhoda kusebenza, uma ubuyela esikrinini sasekhaya, shintshela kolunye uhlelo lokusebenza noma ukhiye ifoni yakho ukuze uqhubeke uqopha, nalapho uvula. izici zokuqopha okuzenzakalelayo (uma uvala isevisi yasemuva, le misebenzi ngeke isebenze).
Ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo entsha ngomsindo oqoshiwe sekuqalile
Ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo entsha kuqale ngaphandle kokurekhoda komsindo
Uma ukhohlwa i-PIN khodi yakho, ngeke ukwazi ukufinyelela okurekhodiwe futhi kuzodingeka ukuthi uphinde ufake uhlelo lokusebenza noma usule idatha yalo.
Faka i-PIN khodi ukuze ukhubaze ukukhiya okurekhodiwe
Noma yiziphi izici ze-premium zesikhathi esizayo
Ukukhokha kuqala uma isivivinyo sakho samahhala siphela. Khansela ngaphambi kokuphela kwesivivinyo futhi ngeke ukhokhiswe.
Ukubhalisa kwakho kuzovuselelwa ngokuzenzakalelayo nyanga zonke ngaphandle uma kukhanseliwe okungenani amahora angama-24 ngaphambi kokuphela kwesikhathi samanje.
Setha isibali sikhathi ukuze uqale ukurekhoda
Khansela ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo okuzenzakalelayo ngokusekelwe kusibali sikhathi samanje?
Isevisi yesibali sikhathi sokuqala ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo ngokuzenzakalela
Buza ukuthi yimuphi umdlali ozodlala kuye
Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa leli fayela levidiyo?
Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa lawa mafayela evidiyo?
Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa le folda yevidiyo?
Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa idatha yefolda yevidiyo?
Vimbela le vidiyo ekususweni ngokuzenzakalela (bhala phezu)?
Sicela uvule izilungiselelo zohlelo bese uvumela ukufinyelela endaweni yokugcina kumemori yefoni
